traits.Amphibious: The croaker can breathe air and water.
traits.Speak with Frogs and Toads: The croaker can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.
traits.Standing Leap: The croaker's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.
traits.Swamp Camouflage: The croaker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.
